sentences.en: Another helpful feature of TUT is the System Info panel.
sentences.cn: 另一项有用的特点,图坦卡门是系统信息面板.

sentences.en: Es tut mir leid, wenn mein Leben jemanden starte.
sentences.cn: 这样就再也不必承担自己的卑贱了.

sentences.en: Es tut so gut wie du mich liebst.
sentences.cn: 遇见你是我这一生最美好的事.

sentences.en: In other words, TUT will be forced to change its name soon.
sentences.cn: 也就是说, 台南科大最近必须被迫改名了.

sentences.en: She was the stepmother of King Tutankhamen , commonly known as King Tut.
sentences.cn: 娜芙提提还是人称图坦王的图坦卡门国王的继母.

sentences.en: The doctor tut-tutted, dismissing my words as excuses.
sentences.cn: 医生啧啧不满，把我的话当作借口不予理睬。

sentences.en: The nurse rushed in, tutting with irritation.
sentences.cn: 护士急匆匆地进来，不高兴地咂着嘴。

sentences.en: This tut won't be as directly useful as the previous parts.
sentences.cn: 这个教程不会像之前的各部分那样有直接的效用.

sentences.en: Tut - tut, how could you do that?
sentences.cn: 吓, 怎么能干这种事 呢 ?

sentences.en: Tut - tut, the boy's late again!
sentences.cn: 咳, 这孩子又迟到了!

sentences.en: Tut-tut, I expected better of you.
sentences.cn: 啧啧，我没想到你会这样。

sentences.en: Tut, tut ! Such a big child acting like a spoiled child.
sentences.cn: 那么大的孩子还撒娇, 真 没羞.

sentences.en: Tut! I've got some chalk on my coat.
sentences.cn: 啧! 我外套上弄上一些粉笔灰了.

sentences.en: We all spent a lot of time tut-tutting about Angie and her lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 我们都没少对安吉和她的生活方式啧啧非议。

sentences.en: Weil alles , was Du mir gibst, einfach so unendlich gut tut.
sentences.cn: 当我的生命遭遇了突变, 你就是我的宁静和避难所.

sentences.en: Wer den Leser kennt, der tut nichts mehr f ü r den Leser.
sentences.cn: 有谁认识读者的, 他将不再为读者尽力.

trans.tran_cn: 嘘（表示焦虑、责难的发声）

trans.tran_en: to express disapproval by making a tut sound
